alert.note: Alert for Mercer (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:04PM EST until December 18 at 11:25PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Assunpink Creek At Trenton affecting Mercer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1130 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Assunpink Creek at Trenton. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Assunpink Park floods. George Page Park floods. Minor street flooding in Trenton. At 9.0 feet, Mulberry Street begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EST Monday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 4.7 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.0 feet on 03/30/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date Assunpink Creek Trenton 8.5 8.9 Mon 2 pm 6.7 5.3 Crested & falling &&
